queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'kruise-daemon' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/run' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'kruise-daemon' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/run' mounted

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[1].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[1].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[1].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[2].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[2].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'kruise-daemon' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'kruise-daemon' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/run' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.runAsUser is undefined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=kruise-manager-role.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=kruise-manager-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=kruise-manager-role.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=kruise-manager-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-webhook-role}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-webhook-role}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: create, delete, get, list, patch, update, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon-secret-role}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon-secret-role}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: create, delete, get, list, update, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{kruise-webhook-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["create", "delete", "get", "list", "patch", "update", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{kruise-webhook-role}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["create", "delete", "get", "list", "patch", "update", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["create", "delete", "get", "list", "update", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{kruise-manager-role}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["create", "delete", "get", "list", "update", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{kruise-daemon-secret-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{kruise-daemon-secret-role}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

queries.description: Container should not share the host network namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' should be set to false or undefined
files.actual_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostNetwork' is true

queries.description: Deployments should be assigned with a PodDisruptionBudget to ensure high availability

files.expected_value: metadata.name=kruise-controller-manager is targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget
files.actual_value: metadata.name=kruise-controller-manager is not targeted by a PodDisruptionBudget

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{daemon}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{daemon}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{manager}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{manager}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-daemon}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{daemon}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kruise-controller-manager}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is undefined
